reviews.review_msg: Amazing prof! She is very helpful and is easy to talk to! I love her teaching style and I would take another course with her again in the future. You can tell she cares about her students and she makes the lecture very interesting (guest lectures etc).
A fantastic prof, really cares about how you are doing and wants you to do well. Her assignments are straightforward and as long as you participate and hand everything in , it is easy to do well.

I don't have enough good things to say about Hilary. She's clear, helpful, and so passionate. She has high expectations, but she helps you reach them every step of the way. I've relied on her mentorship even after the course ended. Take a class with her. You won't regret it.
Gives good feedback and marks fairly, overall great prof! If you keep up with the readings and go to her office hours, she's really helpful! Highly recommend.
She gave me so much great feedback. Highly recommend.
Avoid. Hard marker and not nice.
AWESOME
She really cares about her students. Gives great feedback and marks fairly.
Hilary is an amazing instructor. She goes so far above and beyond for her students. I would take another class with her any time.
Super hard marker on papers & online presentation which weigh heavily on your marks . Avoid at all costs !

Hilary is an amazing TA, really connects with her students, I felt like she was a positive figure and role model for our tutorial and really set the standards high in a great way that pushes students to accomplish and do well! super caring and definitely want to connect with her after the semester.
Fantastic. Had her as TA for crim135. Very caring and goes the extra mile for her students. Really wants you to succeed and do well. Great at facilitating discussion.
Hilary is an amazing professor, she was really engaging, passionate about what she lectures about, and professional/inspirational and she's my girl

CRIM 101 was a great class. Im in health sciences, but she made it so that the concepts were easy to understand and related them to real life. Hillary is really nice and will go the extra mile for her students. Before exams she had extra office hours & she gave us helpful tips on writing before the essay was due. She's hot too...:)

I'm about to grad and have been to two diff institutions but def my fav proff. Helps she's super young, fast paced interactive lectures, super nice (gave us tim bits TWICE!) Made content relatable to real life, brought in guest speakers, had movies in class, but also was expected to read for each class, 2 exams and 1 paper so still academic. :)
great class. lots of reading, but it's interesting. very available. if you put in the work you'll do well.
Hilary is amazing!

Hilary is a great proff! She really cares about her students and wants them to succeed. She made the class really interesting and engaging. Textbook is essential for this class. Final and midterm were also fair, you just need to put in the work and go over the textbook chapters.

I have Hilary for crim 101 and she's great. Ive never had a prof who cares so much about their students and wants them to do well. Id recommend her classes to everyone! She knows what she's talking about and is nice and funny too.

Hilary is so amazing. CRIM 455 had two big writing assignments, but she was so understanding and took the time to encourage us and make sure we felt prepared. I had trouble writing my 20 pg paper, but she offered to phone me and cleared up all my questions. TBH, I've never felt this supported by a prof or TA! She's super knowledgable, too!

Hillary is an excellent, and proficient teacher. Her attention to detail allows her students to fully understand her material. She is a fair marker which makes her very approachable. Hillary heightens her students learning experiences by going above and beyond to ensure each student has the necessary information to excel in her class.

SFU has policies that TA cannot meet students who need assistance. however, she willing to help students in person in order to resolve extra questions. She was really patient and nice to provide me with her experience on wiriting and life experiences. She always try to review my draft of paper and gave me feedback rapidly. Great experience with her

Hilary is an amazing TA. She really cares about her students and if you show at least a little effort in her class she will go the distance for you in getting a good grade. Super friendly, always happy, and most importantly, super hot!

Hilary is one of the best TA's in the crim department. Her offers to help students go far beyond those of other TAs. She makes tutorials engaging and fun, and her ability to be so organized and put together even for 8:30 AM classes is inspiring.  I also really enjoyed her lecture on civilian monitoring police, she knows her stuff . Thanks, Hilary!

Really amazing. Possibly the best TA I've ever had. Engaging and has a great sense of humour. Only critiques are that sometimes the front part of her hair is more curly than the back, and is obsessed with Justin Bieber. Instagram posts are often cringeworthy. Very beautiful. Hates wheat.

Hilary is the best TA I've ever had! She is so helpful, organized, and well dressed. It's inspiring how she can be so sophisticated while still making class fun. She cares about every one of her students, and engages the whole class. I've learned a lot from her, and she makes Crim super interesting.  On top of that she is so gosh darn beautiful!

She's one of the best TAs i have ever had! Very approachable, extremely helpful, always prepared. My interest for Criminology significantly grew after taking this course, and having her as my TA. She genuinely cares about her students, which I find is extremely crucial-especially in an educational setting.
I really liked her! You can tell she tries really hard to engage students and she always shows up to tutorial prepared, easy on the eyes too
